page.title: 03The six a side Football 1985
page.content: We were invited to Colburn to play in a six a side tournament against local schools.The start was delayed because our goalie was late.Our first two games Michael Sydall and Colburn were disappointing draws 0-0.We had two games left we had to win to stay in the competition.We beat Middleton Tyas 5-0 and St. Mary's RC.1-0.We were through to the finals but it was getting too dark so we had to play a few weeks later. In the semi-final against Hipswell the score was 0-0 so we had to play sudden death penalties.We won 1-0. Our final game against Le Cateau ended in a 0-0 draw.We played five minutes extra time each way and scored the winning goal.We won cup for the school and each player was given a trophy. Jason Sheard and Paul Marshall.
